name: elimif

body: -| wi(wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), c0), wb(w0, w2))

comment: Elimination of a conditional operator contained in a wff ` ps ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2005.) (Proof shortened by NM, 25-Apr-2019.)
